    See below for category details. Points cap applies.‡

  • 3X POINTS On Flights & Pre-Paid Hotels

    3X

    POINTS

    On Flights & Pre-Paid Hotels

    Booked on AmexTravel.com.‡

  • 1X POINTS On All Other Eligible Purchases

    1X

    POINTS

    On All Other Eligible Purchases

    Made using your Business Gold Card.‡

Unlock up to $395 in Business Value

$240 Flexible Business Credit

For Purchases at Select Business Merchants

Enroll and get up to $240 back annually for eligible U.S. purchases at FedEx, Grubhub, and Office Supply Stores.‡

See Details

$240 Flexible Business Credit

Earn up to $20 in statement credits monthly after you use the Business Gold Card for eligible U.S. purchases at FedEx, Grubhub, and Office Supply Stores. This can be an annual savings of up to $240. Enrollment required.‡

$155 Walmart+ Credit

For Walmart+ Monthly Membership

Use your Business Gold Card to pay for a monthly Walmart+ membership and get up to $12.95 plus applicable taxes (excluding Plus Ups) back each month.‡

See Details

$155 Walmart+ Credit

Receive a statement credit1 for one monthly Walmart+ membership (subject to auto-renewal) after you pay for Walmart+ each month with your Business Gold Card.‡

1Up to $12.95 plus applicable taxes. Plus Ups not eligible.

American Express can be accepted at 99% of places in the US that accept credit cards.1

   1Based on the Feb 2024 Nilson Report.

All Benefits & Features

  • Maximize Rewards with 4X Points‡
    Earn 4X Membership Rewards® points on the 2 categories where your business spends the most in each billing cycle from 6 categories:
    • Purchases at US media providers for advertising in select media (online, TV, radio)
    • U.S. purchases made from electronic goods retailers and software & cloud system providers
    • U.S. purchases at restaurants, including takeout and delivery
    • U.S. purchases at gas stations
    • Transit purchases including trains, taxicabs, rideshare services, ferries, tolls, parking, buses, and subways
    • Monthly wireless telephone service charges made directly from a wireless telephone service provider in the U.S.
    While your top 2 categories may change each billing cycle based on where your business spent the most, you will earn 4X points on the first $150,000 in combined purchases from these categories each calendar year (then 1X thereafter). Only the top 2 categories from this list each billing cycle will count towards the $150,000 cap.

    Earn 1X Points
    on other select purchases made using your Business Gold Card.‡

    $240 Flexible Business Credit‡
    Get more for your business purchases. Earn up to $20 in statement credits each month after you use the Business Gold Card for eligible U.S. purchases at FedEx, Grubhub, and Office Supply Stores. This can be an annual savings of up to $240. Enrollment required.

    Walmart+ Monthly Membership Credit‡
    Receive a statement credit1 for one monthly Walmart+ membership (subject to auto-renewal) after you pay for Walmart+ each month with your Business Gold Card.

    1Up to $12.95 plus applicable taxes. Plus Ups not eligible.
